alert.note: Alert for Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 2:02PM CDT until April 20 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PUSHMATAHA...SOUTH CENTRAL LATIMER AND WEST CENTRAL LE FLORE COUNTIES... At 202 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles south of Talihina to 4 miles south of Kiamichi, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Talihina... Albion... Kiamichi... Talimena State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
